tool_description: Supported output formats: JSON, HTML, PDF, PNG The Scraper API is a tool that simplifies the process of fetching and extracting data from webpages. You can seamlessly retrieve data from many given URLs. Whether it's a blog post, a news article, or a product page, you can simply provide the API with the webpage's URL.
name: Data Scraper
title: Data Scraper

api_list.name: Scrape Data
